io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.util

Class BitArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.util.BitArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class BitArray
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Direct memory bit set.

    The direct bit set performs bitwise operations on a fixed count HeapBytes instance. Currently, all bytes are HeapBytes, but theoretically MappedBytes could be used for durability as well.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
